document_data.name: Shoalar Quanderil
document_data.mainbody: '''Shoalar Quanderil''' was a high-ranking member of the [[Cult of the Crushing Wave]] during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis.
document_data.Personality: Shoalar always appeared jovial, but with a biting sense of humor and tending to laugh at people rather than with them. He saw [[Olhydra]]'s power as a means to become rich.
document_data.History: Shoalar was once a pirate captain on the [[Sword Coast]] and a Crushing Wave cultist. In [[1491 DR]], he transferred to the [[Dessarin Valley]], where he was involved in an assault on the [[Mirabar]] diplomatic delegation. However, at [[Ironford]] bridge, he was confronted and defeated by some adventurers hired to find the delegation.
